foreignData.name: Nachtschwärmerin
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Nachtschwärmerin ins Spiel kommt, erhalten Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Blitz {2}{B} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Blitz-Kosten wirkst, erhält er Eile und „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, ziehe eine Karte." Opfere diese Kreatur zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments.)

foreignData.name: Apaleadora nocturna
foreignData.text:
Cuando la Apaleadora nocturna entre al campo de batalla, las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes obtienen -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
Irrupción {2}{B}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de irrupción, gana la habilidad de prisa y "Cuando esta criatura muera, roba una carta". Sacrifícala al comienzo del próximo paso final.)

foreignData.name: Matraqueuse nocturne
foreignData.text:
Quand la Matraqueuse nocturne arrive sur le champ de bataille, les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent gagnent -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Blitz {2}{B} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de blitz, il acquiert la célérité et « Quand cette créature meurt, piochez une carte. » Sacrifiez-le au début de la prochaine étape de fin.)

foreignData.name: Festaiola Bellicosa
foreignData.text:
Quando la Festaiola Bellicosa entra nel campo di battaglia, le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari prendono -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
Blitz {2}{B} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di blitz, ha rapidità e "Quando questa creatura muore, pesca una carta". Sacrificala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.)

foreignData.name: 夜の棍棒使い
foreignData.text:
夜の棍棒使いが戦場に出たとき、ターン終了時まで、対戦相手がコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーは－１/－１の修整を受ける。
奇襲{2}{B} （あなたがこの呪文を奇襲コストで唱えたなら、これは速攻と「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、カード１枚を引く。」を得る。次の終了ステップの開始時に、これを生け贄に捧げる。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.name: 한밤의 몽둥이꾼
foreignData.text:
한밤의 몽둥이꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 -1/-1을 받는다.
기습 {2}{B} (기습 비용을 지불해서 이 주문을 발동했다면, 이 생물은 신속 및 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 얻는다. 다음 종료단 시작에 이 생물을 희생한다.)

foreignData.name: Bordoeira Noturna
foreignData.text:
Quando Bordoeira Noturna entra no campo de batalha, as criaturas que seus oponentes controlam recebem -1/-1 até o final do turno.
Blitz {2}{B} (Se você conjura esta mágica por seu custo de blitz, ela ganha ímpeto e "Quando esta criatura morrer, compre um card". Sacrifique-a no início da próxima etapa final.)

foreignData.name: Ночная Дубинщица
foreignData.text:
Когда Ночная Дубинщица выходит на поле битвы, существа под контролем ваших оппонентов получают -1/-1 до конца хода.
Блиц {2}{B} (Если вы разыгрываете это заклинание за его стоимость Блица, оно получает Ускорение и способность «Когда это существо умирает, возьмите карту». Пожертвуйте его в начале следующего заключительного шага.)

foreignData.name: 暗夜使棍手
foreignData.text:
当暗夜使棍手进战场时，由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。
急袭{2}{B}（如果你支付此咒语的急袭费用来施放之，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

foreignData.name: 暗夜使棍手
foreignData.text:
當暗夜使棍手進戰場時，由對手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合結束。
急襲{2}{B}（如果你支付此咒語的急襲費用來施放之，則它獲得敏捷與「當此生物死去時，抽一張牌。」在下一個結束步驟開始時，將它犧牲。）

name: Night Clubber
originalText:
When Night Clubber enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Blitz {2}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the blitz cost rather than the mana cost, you're still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its blitz cost only if you could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the blitz cost to cast a creature spell, that permanent will be sacrificed only if it's still on the battlefield when that triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don't have to attack with the creature with blitz unless another ability says you do.

If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose blitz cost was paid, the copy won't have haste, won't be sacrificed, and its controller won't draw a card when it dies.
The triggered ability that lets its controller draw a card triggers when it dies for any reason, not just when you sacrifice it during the end step.

text:
When Night Clubber enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Blitz {2}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
